commit.message:
Add build option for NTLM support

Currently, NTLM plugin is built by default when openssl is available
and STARTTLS is enabled. But in libesmtp 1.0.6, there is a separate
build option. This commits adds the 'ntlm' option back. It's also
disabled by default.

Like 1.0.6, it will check openssl MD4 algorithm support as MD4 is
insecure and modern systems may drop MD4 support.

Signed-off-by: Jiaqing Zhao <jiaqing.zhao@intel.com>

Add build option for NTLM support

Currently, NTLM plugin is built by default when openssl is available
and STARTTLS is enabled. But in libesmtp 1.0.6, there is a separate
build option. This commits adds the 'ntlm' option back. It's also
disabled by default.

Like 1.0.6, it will check openssl MD4 algorithm support as MD4 is
insecure and modern systems may drop MD4 support.

Signed-off-by: Jiaqing Zhao <jiaqing.zhao@intel.com>

commit.message:
Update rfc2822date for better compliance with RFC 5322

Set timezone to -0000 only when zone is unknown.
Update meson.build to detect timezone variables
Change HAVE_WORKING_STRERROR_R to HAVE_GNU_STRERROR_R
Add smtp_starttls_get_ctx() API call.

Improve smtp_starttls_set_ctx()

Allow ctx argument to be NULL.
Permit call to be used multiple times.
Don't bother trying to cache the SSL_CTX, too complicated
Fix OpenSSL memory leak when certificate file not usable
Use sphinx 'better' theme if available, otherwise 'alabaster'
Minor doc updates, format version options better

Split website and API reference for ease of maintenance

Move website material to alternative repository. Remaining material to
be API reference only.  Use Sphinx "better" theme for reference as this
is a good match for gtk-doc theming in devhelp.

Merge pull request #7 from jbouse/master

Update to correct SONAME version

commit.message:
Update to correct SONAME version

Pass as version to allow Meson to manage SONAME version.
Add section on canonic hostname
Document deliver by operation

Avoid unused return value warning

An improved fix avoiding use of deprecated getpass() is in development.
Documentation tidy, restore legacy NEWS, ChangeLog
Move historic files to documentation or Wiki
Add text on QA method
Update copyright and GPL notice
Fix reports from valgrind testing.
Build mail-file with Meson, remove Makefile
Fix segfault and make smtp_destroy_session clearer
Provide additional version number info
Add dummy file for Sphinx genindex workaround
Remove unused function
Fix test which always evaluates true
Document updates corrections and fixes preparing for v1.1.0 release
Mark function as taking NULL sentinel
Rearrange main pages, update critique
Rename application data apis for clarity
